for those that don't know what an Exo-suit is look here

for those that do know what an exo-suit is then well good for you but first for those who think i had just put this here after i watched Elysium well your wrong because first i didn't watch Elysium right before putting this and i had the idea after reading more sci-fi books by Steven Baxter(more specifically the manifold trilogy)...

now lets get down to buisiness *tents finger with an evil grin*

now what i am suggesting i am sure would make you think of like specialized suits or kerbals but no.

All i am asking is for a mod that gives us exo-suits that can be equipped by kerbals for easier movement on other planets and moons.

how this would work is that they would be equiped manually (as in walking outside and putting it on) and it would allow for faster running, easier movement on lower gravity planets due to added weight, and higher durability( less accidently flying away from your landing site and after hitting the ground you slid off into infinity) also it will allow for easier movement on place like gilly and Eve as it will counteract the gravity with strength and weight

it can also be coupled with KAS to allow for carrying extra Kas containers

any thoughts?

remember it is just a suggestion
